description.displayText: Jessie is the most wonderful person you'll ever meet to take care of your little one. We love Jessie!!!! She is so kind and understanding, very responsible, and with an incredible approach to engage with a kid. My daughter connected with her like never before. They had their special dates, fun games, inside jokes... My daughter adores her. Even after moving out of the state, we still keep in touch and she has become a dear family friend.
description.originalText: Jessie is the most wonderful person you'll ever meet to take care of your little one. We love Jessie!!!! She is so kind and understanding, very responsible, and with an incredible approach to engage with a kid. My daughter connected with her like never before. They had their special dates, fun games, inside jokes... My daughter adores her. Even after moving out of the state, we still keep in touch and she has become a dear family friend.

description.displayText: Jessie has a natural way with children. We honestly did not go much because my daughter typically does not adjust quickly to others. She likes to be with her mommy and is used to me being home with me. It was very hard to leave her. Once our daughter met Jessie it was an instant attraction, for the first time ever she left my arms to go with her without looking back to cry. Her kindness and easy going personality makes children comfortable from the start. Her interactions are genuine and you can see she truly enjoys spending time with them. She is creative and has the ability to entertain children, making a game out of almost anything. We never have to worry, we know are daughter is always in good hands.
description.originalText: Jessie has a natural way with children. We honestly did not go much because my daughter typically does not adjust quickly to others. She likes to be with her mommy and is used to me being home with me. It was very hard to leave her. Once our daughter met Jessie it was an instant attraction, for the first time ever she left my arms to go with her without looking back to cry. Her kindness and easy going personality makes children comfortable from the start. Her interactions are genuine and you can see she truly enjoys spending time with them. She is creative and has the ability to entertain children, making a game out of almost anything. We never have to worry, we know are daughter is always in good hands.

description.displayText:
Jessie, is a trustworthy person, and very patient. With her experience from working  and caring  for the children other than her babysitting job, she has her own special "tricks" that makes kids listen to her, pay attention to her and most of all not just to have fun but learn and develop as an individual. 
I am very pleased with Miss Jessie, she is a very sweet, smart, hard working person, and she knows very well how to work  with children of all attitudes and moods. 
She is very understanding, easy to work with and talk to, and connects with kids in a magical way, not  just as a care giver but as a peer too. I find that very important when it comes to my children, not only they have someone who is caring for them, but a fun friend too who never allows them to get bored!
